articles.title: Did You Know ‘Skull And Bones’ Comes Out In Two Days? - Forbes
articles.description: Skull and Bones is out just a week after its beta, two days from now, and it's entirely understandable if you didn't know that.
articles.content:
Skull and Bones
Ubisoft
While I knew that Skull and Bones just wrapped up a beta this past weekend to show off its pirate ship ambitions, I am wondering how many people understood just how close th… [+2837 chars]
